IX.iii.1.D.1.j
.
Future Commencing Date for Parents’ DIC
Generally, original and new awards should
not
provide for a future commencing date.  However, award action may be taken to provide for a payment date as of the first day of the next year, if the evidence establishes
non-entitlement for the current (received) year because of excessive income, and
entitlement for the next calendar year based on anticipated (reduced) income for the next calendar year.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D - Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Authorization
